title: Schema for the Data Marketplace
description: Schema to be used for data resource records in the Cross-Government Data Marketplace Catalogue.

@id.description: A unique url to identify the data resource

@type.description: The type of the data resource.

title.description: The name of the data resource

alternativeTitle.description: Alternative names for the data resource including common abbreviations and synonyms.

description.description: A description of the data resource

identifier.description: A unique number, code, or reference value assigned to an information resource within a given context. Local identifier for the resource.

keyword.description: Uncontrolled terms (words or phrases) assigned to describe an information resource.

theme.description: A controlled term that expresses a topic of the intellectual content of an information resource.

licence.description: Reference to the legal document outlining access and usage rights for an information resource.

version.description: The version number of the data resource.

issued.description: The date on which an information resource was originally published or otherwise made publicly available for the first time.

contactPoint.description: Point of contact for the data resource either as a team email address or a contact object.

name.description: Name of the point of contact or the team name.

email.description: Email address for the point of contact. Preferable a team email address.

modified.description: The date on which the content of an information resource is changed.

creator.description: The URI of the business entity responsible for creating or compiling the original content of an information resource.

publisher.description: The URI of the business entity responsible for making an information resource publicly available.

data-service.description: Properties for a data service description.

endpointURL.description: The URL of the service endpoint

endpointDescription.description: The URL to the documentation for the service
